content: मांगल्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मंगलाय हितं ष्यञ्] Auspicious, indicative of good fortune; <ls>Ś. 4. 4.</ls> --ल्यं {@--1@} Auspiciousness, prosperity, welfare, good fortune. {@--2@} A blessing or benediction. {@--3@} A festivity, festival, any auspicious rite. {@--4@} An auspicious thing, amulet.
